directions: Mix together margarine, peanut butter, confectioners' sugar and graham cracker crumbs by hand.  Form into 2 inch balls and place on wax paper.
Melt chocolate chips in top of double boiler. Put a toothpick in the peanut butter balls and dip in chocolate until 3/4 covered. Place on waxed paper to cool.
title: Buckeye Cookies II
